artisanal-gold-tabora.title: Artisanal Gold Miners
artisanal-gold-tabora.description: Comprehensive assessment and support for artisanal gold mining operations in Tabora region. Our team provided geological guidance, safety assessments, and resource evaluation to help small-scale miners optimize their operations.

artisanal-miners-morogoro.title: Artisanal Miners
artisanal-miners-morogoro.description: Technical support and geological assessment for artisanal mining operations in Morogoro. Provided training on sustainable mining practices and resource management.

beryllium-namtumbo.title: Beryllium
beryllium-namtumbo.description: Beryllium exploration and assessment project in Namtumbo district. Conducted detailed geological surveys and sampling programs to evaluate the beryllium potential of the area.

beryllium-prospecting-namtumbo.title: Beryllium Prospecting
beryllium-prospecting-namtumbo.description: Advanced beryllium prospecting program utilizing modern exploration techniques including geochemical sampling, geological mapping, and geophysical surveys.

coal-mapping-liweta.title: Coal Outcrop Mapping
coal-mapping-liweta.description: Detailed geological mapping of coal outcrops in Liweta area. Comprehensive structural analysis and coal seam characterization to support resource estimation.

core-drilling.title: Core Drilling
core-drilling.description: Professional core drilling services for mineral exploration and resource definition. Our experienced team ensures high-quality core recovery and accurate geological logging across various mineral exploration projects.

cu-zn-mpanda.title: Cu-Zn Exploration
cu-zn-mpanda.description: Copper-zinc exploration program in Mpanda district. Comprehensive exploration including soil sampling, trenching, and geophysical surveys to identify mineralized zones.

dolomite-dodoma.title: Dolomite Prospecting
dolomite-dodoma.description: Dolomite prospecting and resource assessment in Dodoma region. Detailed geological mapping and sampling to evaluate the quality and quantity of dolomite deposits.

face-mapping-coal.title: Face Mapping in Coal Mine
face-mapping-coal.description: Underground face mapping services for active coal mining operations. Detailed structural and stratigraphic mapping to optimize mining operations and ensure safety.
images: images/projects/Face mapping in a coal mine.jpg

gold-mazizi-morogoro.title: Gold Mineralization
gold-mazizi-morogoro.description: Gold exploration and mineralization study in Mazizi area, Morogoro region. Comprehensive geological investigation including mapping, sampling, and resource potential assessment.

graphite-stockpile-merelani.title: Graphite Kyanite Gneiss Stockpile
graphite-stockpile-merelani.description: Stockpile assessment and quality control for graphite-kyanite-gneiss material in Merelani. Detailed sampling and analysis to determine commercial viability.
images: images/projects/Graphite kyanite gneiss stockpile in Merelani.jpg

graphite-merelani.title: Graphite Kyanite Gneiss
graphite-merelani.description: Geological assessment of graphite-kyanite-gneiss deposits in Merelani area. Detailed mineralogical studies and resource evaluation.

lithium-dodoma.title: Pegmatite Lithium Exploration
lithium-dodoma.description: Lithium exploration in pegmatite deposits around Dodoma region. Comprehensive exploration program including geological mapping, geochemical sampling, and resource assessment.

quartz-morogoro.title: Quartz Prospecting
quartz-morogoro.description: Quartz prospecting and quality assessment in Morogoro region. Evaluation of quartz deposits for industrial and commercial applications.
